meanings.meaning: an opportunity not to be lost

vlive.korean: [차기 왕세자 놓칠 수 없어...] 36, 37, 38, 39... [I'll be the next crown prince] 35, 37, 38, 39... 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.4
이걸 놓칠 수 없다 이거죠! I need to grab this opportunity! 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 현진이의 연습실😎#4
vlive.english: I need to grab this opportunity!

vlive.korean: [못하면 기회를 놓칠 수도 있다는 두려움] 눈앞에 두고 놓칠 것 같다는 두려움? [Fear of missing the opportunity] that I might ruin it. 듣기 View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 8. 들어는 보았는가 뇌세포 절단랩!? 마! 이게 공대생의 랩이다! 포스텍 "피펑크"
vlive.english: [Fear of missing the opportunity] that I might ruin it.

vlive.korean: [먹던 라면도 끓여야 하는 라면도 놓칠 수 없는 정한] 라면 수프 좀 넣었어? [Jeonghan needs to eat ramen and cook ramen, too] Did you add powder? 듣기 View video Dispatch : [ⓓxV] “셉라면 챌린지③” (세븐틴 : SEVENTEEN)
vlive.english: [Jeonghan needs to eat ramen and cook ramen, too] Did you add powder?

vlive.korean: [놓칠 수 없는 기회] 대표님 워킹 한 번 볼 수 있어요? [A chance not to be missed] Can we see your walking? 듣기 View video Mnet : [EP.2] ‘Lee Dong Wook’s Visuals As Expected, It’s Runway Time~☆
vlive.english: [A chance not to be missed] Can we see your walking?

examples.korean: The sale prices were too good to miss. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 세일 가격이 너무 좋아서 놓칠 수가 없었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The sale prices were too good to miss. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: ‘Are you coming to the school play?’ ‘I wouldn’t miss it for the world.’ 듣기 Add to Wordbook “학교 연극에 갈 거니?” “무슨 일이 있어도 그건 놓칠 수 없지.” Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘Are you coming to the school play?’ ‘I wouldn’t miss it for the world.’ Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I can help guide this company's expansion into those markets-taking advantage of opportunities others with less experience might miss, and avoiding pitfalls that I've encountered before. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 저는 이 회사가 그 시장들로 진출하는 것을 도울 수 있습니다. 경험이 적은 타사들이 놓칠 수 있는 좋은 기회를 이용하고 제가 이전에 맞닥뜨렸던 함정을 피하면서 말이죠. DARAKWON
examples.english: I can help guide this company's expansion into those markets-taking advantage of opportunities others with less experience might miss, and avoiding pitfalls that I've encountered before. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Well, They're going to miss me, but they know It's an opportunity I can't pass up. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내가 없어서 섭섭하시겠지만, 놓칠 수 없는 기회라는 걸 아시니까요. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Well, They're going to miss me, but they know It's an opportunity I can't pass up. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We can't miss it visiting China. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 중국에 가면 놓칠 수 없는거야. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We can't miss it visiting China. Add to Wordbook
